package.name: agg
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xzf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.gz fi
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} rsync -avHP include/ /usr/include/agg2/ chmod -R 0755 /usr/include/agg2/ install -m 0755 src/libagg.a /usr/lib/
